column4: does anyone know anything about problems with messed up videos?
i downloaded a music video off democracyplayer and its an mp4 and when i try to play it, i get a green bar at the top and the video is all messed up
i think it also messes up when i try to play and xvid video
well, just a guess, but last time that happened to me i was playing a DRM-encrypted wmv, so...
